title: New: Sega Bodega – Stay Nervous
body:
Having recently returned from a stint in Barcelona, Glasgow’s [Sega Bodega](https://www.facebook.com/segabodega) is really beginning to show us his production and melodic chops. With swirling synths and a horn section that [Kanye](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qJos0ifG7T0) would be proud of, “Stay Nervous” is the Glaswegian’s most immediate track yet. One to get excited about in 2014.

His Song Dynasty E.P is available now, via Week of Wonders.

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/124138457″ params=”color=ff6600&auto\_play=false&show\_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
